section.name: Building Apache log4net™
section.p: The log4net release builds are built using zarro. Log4net can also be built using Visual Studio.

section.name: Visual Studio
section.p: Visual Studio 2019 and 2022 are supported build platforms for log4net.

section.name: Visual Studio
section.p: The log4net distribution includes a solution and project file for Visual Studio. Open the log4net.sln from the src directory in the distribution.

section.name: SDK Reference
section.p: Sandcastle Helpfile Builder is used to build the log4net SDK documentation. Running it is currently not integrated with the NAnt build process, you'll have to open and run log4net.shfbproj with SHFB manually.
